item.title: Writing your first webpage, pt. 1: HTML
item.description: So, you want to build a website, but you don’t know where to start. Maybe you’ve heard something about HTML, but you aren’t sure what it is. Maybe you’ve never heard of it. Either way, this post will help you get started building websites! What is a website? A website is just a bunch of files, like the files on your computer. Each file is made up of some text that tells your browser (e.
